text: @realDonaldTrump Hey asswipe; 70,000 US citizens are now dead due to your arrogance, ignorance, selfishness, and inaction. You called the COVID-19 pandemic a “hoax” and went golfing in Florida, instead of preparing the country for the pandemic. Blood of US citizens is on your hands.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Coronavirus: Human trials for experimental vaccine begin in the US
entity.description:
Pharmaceutical companies Pfizer and BioNTech confirmed the start of human trials for a potential coronavirus vaccine. If successful, the vaccine could be in "emergency use" starting in September, officials say.
